data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Coventry with the kick-off.
Samba Sow (Nottingham) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 30, Goal! Scott McKenna gives Nottingham a 1-0 lead.
Geoff Eltringham blows to end the first-half.
It's Nottingham with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 56, Mark Robins (Coventry) is making a first substitution, with Tyler Walker replacing Matt Godden.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Callum O`Hare.
Chris Hughton is making the team's second substitution at City Ground with Sammy Ameobi replacing Luke Freeman.
In the minute 68, Ryan Yates is on a sub for Samba Sow for Nottingham.
The home team replace Anthony Knockaert with Miguel Angel Guerrero.
Leo Ostigard (Coventry) has received a yellow card from Geoff Eltringham.
Nottingham have been given a penalty...
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Julien Da Costa is replacing Ryan Giles for the away team.
At City Ground, Kyle McFadzean has been yellow-carded for the away team.
It's advantage Nottingham in Nottingham as Lyle Taylor scores from the spot to make it 2-1.
